adHeader: NextArts Pipe and Drape Rental and Services
adDetails: www.NextArts.org http://www.nextarts.org/pipe-drape-services-rentals http://www.nextarts.org/drapery-fabrics Rent Pipe and Drape from NextArts. We provide custom drapery rentals. NextArts provides dramatic, cost-effective transformations and event drapery decor solutions, custom or rented, for a wide variety of industries and occasions in nearly any venue or location. We use only the highest quality fabric and materials. Our drapes are made of 16 to 25 ounce velour in a multitude of colors. We also work with sheer and nu-voile drapery, which combined with lighting or layered over another color creates a stunning effect. We service the entire SF Bay Area including, San Francisco, Oakland, San Jose, Menlo Park, Palo Alto, Napa, Sonoma and all of Wine Country.
